trans-unit.source: Provides special handling information to inform event listeners whether specific handlers should be invoked.
Determines whether the specified object is equivalent to the current <xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventHandlerInfo"></xref>.
The object to compare to the current <xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventHandlerInfo"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object is equivalent to the current <xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventHandlerInfo"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventHandlerInfo"></xref> is equivalent to the current <xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventHandlerInfo"></xref>.
This implementation relies on value equivalence of the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventHandlerInfo.Handler%2A><xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventHandlerInfo.InvokeHandledEventsToo%2A> properties.
The <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventHandlerInfo.Handler%2A> property is a delegate reference.
Therefore, equivalence implies a duplicate reference to the same handler.
The <xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventHandlerInfo"></xref> to compare to the current <xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventHandlerInfo"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventHandlerInfo"></xref> is equivalent to the current <xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventHandlerInfo"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a hash code for the current <xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventHandlerInfo"></xref>.
A hash code for the current <xref href="System.Windows.RoutedEventHandlerInfo"></xref>.
Gets the event handler.
The event handler.
Gets a value that indicates whether the event handler is invoked when the routed event is marked handled.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event handler is invoked when the routed event is marked handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Determines whether the specified objects are equivalent.
The first object to compare.
The second object to compare.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the objects are equivalent; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Determines whether the specified objects are not equivalent.
The first object to compare.
The second object to compare.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the objects are not equivalent; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
